body_html: @kzos, hexagon_graph_execution_test.cc is a test application intended to run the inception models. If you want to run an inference on HVX in a more generic way, you should write your own program to follow tensorflow inference steps. Anyway, the upcoming refactoring will allow you to benchmark arbitrary graph on HVX by benchmark_model.cc without using hexagon_graph_execution_test.cc, and that will help you to understand these tensorflow steps.

body: @kzos, hexagon_graph_execution_test.cc is a test application intended to run the inception models.  If you want to run an inference on HVX in a more generic way, you should write your own program to follow tensorflow inference steps.  Anyway, the upcoming refactoring will allow you to benchmark arbitrary graph on HVX by benchmark_model.cc without using hexagon_graph_execution_test.cc, and that will help you to understand these tensorflow steps.
